data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea engelmannii (Engelmann spruce) from sample BELL-12

Exposition W, Slope 5 deg, Geology: Silikat Moränenschutt, Tree line 1800 m, av. Tree height 25 m, Tree cover 75%, Shrub cover 80%, Herb cover 5%, Moss cover 90%, Vegatation type: Urw. mehrst. m. viel Strauchunterw. Auf. l. Ku, Film number: 709A
